heading: This Afternoon
text: Sun mixing with increasing high clouds, except mostly cloudy far south. Highs in the low to mid 50s. Northeast winds 5 to 10 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Variable clouds. Lows from the upper 20s to mid 30s, except mid to upper 30s far south, and in the broad valleys west. Winds becoming light, variable to east.

heading: Thursday
text: Thickening clouds. A rising chance of showers south and west of Interstate 89; arriving mainly mid to late afternoon to the north and east of I-89. Highs in the low to mid 50s, with some upper 40s in the Adirondacks. East winds 5 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph in southern areas.
